title: IISER Thiruvananthapuram Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 17 Junior Assistant, Lab Assistant and Other Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Thiruvananthapuram (IISER Thiruvananthapuram) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 17 Junior Office Assistant, Junior Assistant, Junior Technical Assistant, Lab Assistant, Nursing Assistant, and Attendant Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Post-graduation, B.Sc, B.Sc Nurs...
